problems.title: Simple Loop Output
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
The loop runs from i=1 to i=5 (inclusive). In each iteration, it prints the value of i followed by a space.

Iteration 1: i=1, prints '1 '
Iteration 2: i=2, prints '2 '
Iteration 3: i=3, prints '3 '
Iteration 4: i=4, prints '4 '
Iteration 5: i=5, prints '5 '

Final output: 1 2 3 4 5

problems.title: Variable Increment
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Step-by-step execution:
1. x = 5 (initial value)
2. x = x + 3 → x = 5 + 3 = 8
3. x = x * 2 → x = 8 * 2 = 16
4. Print x → prints 16

problems.title: If-Else Statement
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Step-by-step:
1. a = 10, b = 20
2. Check condition: a > b → 10 > 20 → false
3. Since condition is false, execute else block
4. Print 'B'

problems.title: Array Sum
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Tracing the loop:
Initial: sum = 0

Iteration 1: i=0, sum = 0 + arr[0] = 0 + 2 = 2
Iteration 2: i=1, sum = 2 + arr[1] = 2 + 4 = 6
Iteration 3: i=2, sum = 6 + arr[2] = 6 + 6 = 12
Iteration 4: i=3, sum = 12 + arr[3] = 12 + 8 = 20

Final sum = 20

problems.title: Nested Loop Pattern
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Outer loop runs 3 times (i=1,2,3)
Inner loop runs 2 times for each outer iteration (j=1,2)

i=1: j=1 → print '11 ', j=2 → print '12 '
i=2: j=1 → print '21 ', j=2 → print '22 '
i=3: j=1 → print '31 ', j=2 → print '32 '

Output: 11 12 21 22 31 32

problems.title: While Loop Counter
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Loop continues while n > 5:

Iteration 1: n=10 (10>5 true), print '10 ', n = 10-2 = 8
Iteration 2: n=8 (8>5 true), print '8 ', n = 8-2 = 6
Iteration 3: n=6 (6>5 true), print '6 ', n = 6-2 = 4
Iteration 4: n=4 (4>5 false), loop stops

Output: 10 8 6

problems.title: Modulo Operation
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Loop from 1 to 6, print only even numbers (i%2==0):

i=1: 1%2=1 (not 0), skip
i=2: 2%2=0 (true), print '2 '
i=3: 3%2=1 (not 0), skip
i=4: 4%2=0 (true), print '4 '
i=5: 5%2=1 (not 0), skip
i=6: 6%2=0 (true), print '6 '

Output: 2 4 6

problems.title: String Output
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Simple string concatenation:
1. Print 'Hello'
2. Print ' ' (space)
3. Print 'World'

All printed on same line without newline.

problems.title: Post-Increment vs Pre-Increment
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Understanding increment operators:

1. x = 5
2. cout << x++: prints current value (5), then increments x to 6
3. cout << ++x: increments x to 7, then prints new value (7)
4. cout << x: prints current value (7)

Output: 5 7 7

problems.title: Break Statement
problems.description: Trace the code and predict the exact output.
problems.explanation:
Loop with break:

i=1: 1≠5, print '1 '
i=2: 2≠5, print '2 '
i=3: 3≠5, print '3 '
i=4: 4≠5, print '4 '
i=5: 5==5, break (exit loop)

Output: 1 2 3 4
